question: 箱
sourceAnswer: box/case/chest/package/pack/crate | car-(of-a-train,-etc.) | shamisen-case/shamisen | public-building/community-building | man-who-carries-a-geisha's-shamisen | receptacle-for-human-waste/feces-(faeces) | counter-for-boxes-(or-boxed-objects)
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji.
